ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate (was RE: Lvl 48 song ?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, we unanimously agreed that bards should stop songs before the monk leaves to pull. It is possible that the monk could be coming back with a mob or 10
ygData.messageBody:
Well, we unanimously agreed that bards should stop songs before the monk
leaves to pull. It is possible that the monk could be coming back with a mob
or 10 feign, bard song hits him, hate list transfers, he feigns, mob comes
to rape you. Or something like that. Better safe than sorry.

I am pretty sure the 19/29 weapon is for WAR/SK, maybe PAL/RNG, and not for
BRD/ROG. Will ask next time I talk to the guy who got it.

I keep hearing Imbrued is dropped on scorn banshees, but I won't believe it
til I see it. Not too interested in the rapier either - if I were to get one
and we killed Mr. Maestro that would knock me out of lottoing rights on his
loots. =) Either way I won't give up a Yak for a rapier.

Take care,
Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan

>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lvl 48 song ?
>Date: Thu, 18 Nov 1999 10:43:09 -0500
>
>last time i was there,i was told the same thing. the consensus was to sing
>away until the monk went to pull, then all bards stopped singing. no idea
>if it means anything, but better to keep everyone happy and keep the bards
>out of blame for trains =) i haven't been there since the feign death
>changes, so don't know how that changes the pulling strategy, but everytime
>i have been there it was a monk pulling and an enchanter scouting.
>
>we have yet to see any imbrued in hate yet either, all bards that have any
>got it from fear. good luck on either a rapier, or those beautiful weps on
>our favorite guy the maestro.
>
>Shada
>
>p.s. 19/29 drool, i hope it wasn't bard! then i don't have to worry about
>not having one =)
